testcase.failure:
Given Initiate browser......................................................passed Given Navigate to Midtrans Demo homepage....................................passed When User click Buy Now button..............................................passed And Shopping Cart page is appear............................................passed And User fill Price Amount with "10000".....................................passed And User fill Name with "rozi"..............................................passed And User fill Email with "rozi@email.com"...................................passed And User fill Phone Number with "08123456"..................................passed And user fill City with "jakarta"...........................................passed And User fill Address with "jl. sukses".....................................passed And User fill Postal Code with "12620"......................................passed And User click Checkout button..............................................passed And Order Summary page is appear............................................passed And Order Summary Amount must be same as Shopping Cart Amount...............passed And Shipping Details must be same as Customer Details.......................passed And User click Continue button..............................................passed And User choose Credit/Debit Card payment method............................passed But User fill Card Number with "4911111111111113"...........................passed And User fill Card Expiry Date with "12/20".................................passed And User fill Card CVV with "123"...........................................passed And User select one of Promos availables....................................passed And Check Customers Detail..................................................passed And User click Pay Now button...............................................passed And User fill Password with "112233"........................................failed And User click Ok button....................................................skipped Then Transaction should be failed...........................................skipped
